      ["" false] string)))

    (apply str (first s) (map clojure.string/capitalize (rest s)))))

(fn [string]
  (let [[x & xs] (clojure.string/split string #"-")]
    (apply str x (map clojure.string/capitalize xs))))

(fn [s]
  (let [words (clojure.string/split s #"-")]
    (apply str
      (conj
        (map 
          (fn [w] (apply str (Character/toUpperCase (first w)) (rest w)))
          (rest words))
       (first words)))))

(fn [s]
    (let [[f* & s*] (clojure.string/split s #"-")]
      (->> (map (fn [[f & r]]
                  (apply str (clojure.string/upper-case f) r)) s*)
           (apply str f*))))

(fn camel-case [s]
  (let [[a & b] (clojure.string/split s #"[-\s]+")]
    (clojure.string/join
     ""
     (cons a (map clojure.string/capitalize b)))))

(fn [str]
  (let [
        words (clojure.string/split str #"-")
        fst (first words)
        rst (rest words)]
  (clojure.string/join (cons fst (map clojure.string/capitalize rst)))))

(fn [s]
  (let [[word & words] (clojure.string/split s #"-")]
    (clojure.string/join (conj (map clojure.string/capitalize words) word))))

;; capitalize as above passes the tests but IMO does not accurately fulfill the specification
;; since it will mangle acronyms like 'get-FBI-docs' into 'getFbiDocs'
;; below is my hand-implement capitalization function, which for some reason
;; causes the unit tests to fail, even though in a local repl it produces the correct behavior
#_(fn [w]
  (let [[c cs] (clojure.string/split w #"" 2)] 
    (str (clojure.string/upper-case c) cs)))

(fn __ [s]
  (let [ss (clojure.string/split s #"-")
      f (first ss)
      r (rest ss)
      rc (map clojure.string/capitalize r)]
    (apply str (concat f rc))))

(fn [s]
    (letfn [(title-case [s]
              (let [ss (map #(-> % identity str) s)]
                (apply str (cons (clojure.string/capitalize (first ss))
                                 (rest ss)))))]
      (let [tokens (clojure.string/split s #"-")]
        (apply str (cons (first tokens) (map title-case (rest tokens)))))))

(fn [input-str]
  (let [string-seq (clojure.string/split input-str #"-")]
    (if (= 1 (count string-seq))
      input-str
      (let [first-word (first string-seq)
            rest-words (map #(clojure.string/capitalize %) (rest string-seq))]
        (clojure.string/join (cons first-word rest-words))))))

(fn [w]
  (let [[first & rest] (clojure.string/split w #"-")]

(fn [s]

(fn [s]

        z (map clojure.string/capitalize y)]

(fn [s]
       (let [toUpper
             {\a \A \b \B \c \C \d \D \e \E \f \F \g \G \h \H \i \I \j \J \k \K \l \L \m \M
              \n \N \o \O \p \P \q \Q \r \R \s \S \t \T \u \U \v \V \w \W \x \X \y \Y \z \Z}
              words
             (->> (partition-by #(= \- %) s)
                  (map #(apply str %))
                  (remove #(= "-" %)))]
         (apply str (first words)
                (map #(str (toUpper (first %)) (subs % 1)) (rest words)))))

(fn [s]
(let [words (clojure.string/split s #"-")

      restWords (->> words rest (map clojure.string/capitalize))]

(fn to-camel-case [st]
  (let [[word rst] (split-with (partial not= \-) st)]
    (apply str
           (if (empty? rst)
             word
             (concat word
                     (to-camel-case (clojure.string/capitalize (apply str (rest rst)))))))))

(fn [s]
  (if (some #{\-} s)
    (let [split (clojure.string/split s #"-")
          camel (cons (first split) 
                      (map clojure.string/capitalize (rest split)))]
      (clojure.string/join camel))
    s))

(fn [s]
  (let [v (vec s) dash (fn [i] (and (>= i 0) (= (nth v i) \-)))]
    (apply str (map
                (fn [i] (if
                          (dash i)
                          ""
                          (let [ch (nth v i)]
                            (if (-> i dec dash) (Character/toUpperCase ch) ch))))
                (-> v count range)))))

(fn dashed-to-camel [s]

#(let [ws (clojure.string/split (clojure.string/replace % #"-([a-z])" " $1" ) #" ")]
    (if (and (not-empty ws) (> (count ws) 1)) (apply str (cons (first ws) (map clojure.string/capitalize (rest ws)))) (apply str ws)))

(fn[a]
  (if(.contains a "-")
    (let[b (.split a "-")
         c (fn[aa](apply str (-> (first aa) (str) (.toUpperCase)) (drop 1 aa)))]
      (loop
        [res (first b)
        remain (drop 1 b)]
        (if(= (count remain) 0) res
        (recur 
          (str res (c (first remain))) 
          (drop 1 remain))
      ))
    )
    a
  )
)

(fn [string] 
  (->> (clojure.string/split string #"-")
       (apply (fn [f & r] (apply concat f (map #(clojure.string/capitalize %) r))))
       (apply str)))

(fn camelCase [text]
  (let [split-words (clojure.string/split text #"\W")
        first-word (first split-words)
        rest-words (rest split-words)]
    (->>
         (map 
           (fn [word] (concat 	(clojure.string/upper-case (first word))  (rest word)))
           rest-words)
        (apply concat first-word ,,,)
        (apply str  ,,,))))

(fn [s]
    (let [words (map vec (clojure.string/split s #"-"))]
      (->> (rest words)
           (map #(update-in % [0] (comp  clojure.string/upper-case str)))
           (cons (first words))
           (map #(apply str %))
           (vec)
           (apply str))))

(fn [s]
   (->> s

        (map (fn [current-char last-char]
               (if (= last-char \-)
                 (first (clojure.string/upper-case current-char))
                 current-char))
             (drop 1 s))
        (cons (first s))
        (remove #{\-})
        (apply str)))

(fn str->camel-case
  [s]
  (let [split-str
        (clojure.string/split s #"-")

        first-word
        (first split-str)

        rest-words
        (rest split-str)]

    (->> (map (fn [s] (str (clojure.string/upper-case (first s)) (apply str (rest s)))) rest-words)
         (apply str)
         (str first-word))))

(fn [x]
  (let [x1 (into [] (map str (apply vector x)))
        x2 (reduce #(if (= (last %) "-") (conj % (.toUpperCase %2)) (conj % %2))[] x1)
        x3 (reduce #(if (= %2 "-") % (conj % %2)) [] x2)]
    (apply str x3)))

(fn f
    ([[c & cs] acc]
     (println c)
     (cond
       (= c \-) (let [[d & css] cs]
                  (if d
                    (recur css (conj acc  (char (- (int d) 32))))
                    acc))
       (nil? c) acc
       :else (recur cs (conj acc c))))
    ([s] (apply str (f s []))))

(fn [s]
    (let [ss          (clojure.string/split s #"-")
          upper-first (fn [s]
                        (let [u   (.toUpperCase s)
                              fst (first u)
                              rst (rest s)]
                          (apply str
                                 (cons fst rst))))
          ss-upper    (map upper-first
                           ss)]
      (apply str
             (cons (first ss)
                   (rest ss-upper)))))

(fn foo [s] (loop [s (map str (seq s)) o []]
  (if (empty? s)
    (apply str o)
    (if (= (first s) "-")
      (recur (rest (rest s)) (conj o (clojure.string/upper-case (first (rest s)))))
      (recur (rest s) (conj o (first s)))
    )))
)

(fn to-camel
  [string]
  (let [size (count string) vecstr (vec string)]
    (loop [i 0 partial []]
      (if (< i  size)
        (if (= \- (nth vecstr i))
          (recur (+ 2 i) (conj partial (->> (nth vecstr (+ i 1)) str .toUpperCase  )))
          (recur (+ 1 i) (conj partial (->> (nth vecstr i) str  ))))
        (reduce str partial)))))

(fn [s]
  (apply str 
         (:chars 
          (reduce (fn [acc x]
                    (if (:cap acc)
                      (->
                       acc
                       (assoc :cap nil)
                       (update-in [:chars] conj (Character/toUpperCase x)))
                      (if (= x \-)
                        (assoc acc :cap true)
                        (update-in acc [:chars] conj x))))
                  {:cap nil :chars []}
                  (seq s)))))

            (mapcat 
              (fn [[a b]]

(fn into-camel-case [s]
  (loop [result [] [c & cs] s]
    (cond
      (nil? c) (apply str result)
      (= c \-) (recur (conj result (Character/toUpperCase (first cs))) (rest cs))
      :else (recur (conj result c) cs)))
  )

(fn [word]
  (let [->to-upper-case (zipmap (map char (range (int \a) (inc (int \z))))
                                (map char (range (int \A) (inc (int \Z)))))
        capitalize (fn [w]
                     (apply str (concat [(->to-upper-case (first w))]
                                        (rest w))))
        words    (->> word (re-seq #"\w+"))]
    (apply str (concat [(first words)]
                       (map capitalize (rest words))))))

(fn icc [word]
  (let [pairs (cons (list nil (first word))
                    (partition 2 1 word))
        without-dashes (filter #(not= \- (second %)) pairs)
        converted (map (fn [pair]
                         (if (= \- (first pair))
                           (Character/toUpperCase (second pair))
                           (second pair))) without-dashes)]
    (apply str converted)))

(fn str-lis
  ([s]
   (str-lis s [] nil)
   )
  ([s tar prv]
   (if (empty? s)
     (apply str tar)
     (do (if (= (first "-") (first s))
           (str-lis (rest s) tar (first s))
           (str-lis (rest s) (conj tar (if (= prv (first "-"))
                                         (clojure.string/upper-case (first s))
                                         (first s)
                                         )) nil))
         )
     )
   )
  )

(fn to-camel-case [s]
  (clojure.string/join
   (for [i (range (count s))]
     (let [c (get s i)]
       (cond
         (= c \-) nil
         (zero? i) c
         (= (get s (dec i)) \-) (clojure.string/upper-case (str c))
         :else c)))))

    (if (nil? xs)
     s
     (->> (map clojure.string/capitalize xs)
       (concat [x])
       (clojure.string/join "")))))

(fn [s]
  (apply str (first s) (keep (fn [[c1 c2]] (if (= \- c1)
                                            (Character/toUpperCase c2)
                                            (when (not= \- c2) c2))) (partition 2 1 s))))

(fn [s] (let [[x & xs] (clojure.string/split s #"-")]

(fn camel-case [sentence] (let [first-letter-up (fn [word] (let [[f & others] word]
                                                               (apply str (cons (Character/toUpperCase f) others))))
                                  words (clojure.string/split sentence #"-")]
                              (reduce #(str %1 (first-letter-up %2)) (first words) (rest words))))

(fn p-102 [s-input]
  (let [splits (clojure.string/split s-input #"-")
        first-split (first splits)
        rest-splits (rest splits)
        rest-transformed (map (fn [s] (str
                  (clojure.string/upper-case (str (first s)))
                  (apply str (rest s))))
                              rest-splits)]
    (if (empty? rest-transformed) s-input
        (apply str first-split rest-transformed))))

(fn [kebab-str]
  (letfn [(upper-first [w] (let [[fc & rc] w] (apply str (clojure.string/upper-case fc) rc)))]
    (let [[fw & rw] (clojure.string/split kebab-str #"-")]
      (apply str fw (map upper-first rw)))))

(fn camelCase [s]
  (apply str 
         (cond (= 1 (count s)) s
        (= (first s) \-) (cons (clojure.string/upper-case (second s)) (camelCase (rest (rest s))))
        :else (cons (first s) (camelCase (rest s))))))

(fn [s]
    (letfn [(step [f xs]
              (cond
                (not (seq xs)) ""
                (= \- (first xs)) (step #(-> % int (- 32) char) (rest xs))
                :else (str (f (first xs)) (step identity (rest xs)))))]
      (step identity s)))

(fn [in-str]
   (let [trimmed (clojure.string/replace in-str #"-*$" "")]
     (if (empty? trimmed) ""
         (let [[ch & ct :as cs] (apply list (reverse trimmed))
               upper-ch #(first (clojure.string/upper-case %))
               func (fn [ch coll]
                      (if (= \- ch)
                        (cons (upper-ch (first coll)) (rest coll))
                        (cons ch coll)))]
           (loop [cs cs
                  rev []]
             (if (empty? cs) (apply str rev)
                 (recur (rest cs) (func (first cs) rev))))))))

(fn camel [source-str]
  (let [splitted (clojure.string/split source-str #"-")
        first-split (first splitted)
        rest-split (rest splitted)]
    (if (empty? (rest splitted))
    source-str
    (clojure.string/join (cons first-split (map clojure.string/join (map #(concat (clojure.string/upper-case (first %)) (rest %)) rest-split)))))))

(fn into-camel-case [string]
  (let [phrase (clojure.string/split string #"-")]
    (cond
      (= 1 (count phrase)) (first phrase)
      :else (clojure.string/join 
             (concat (first phrase)
                     (map clojure.string/capitalize (rest phrase)))))))

(fn into-camel [s]
  (letfn [(update-camel-part [s]
            (clojure.string/replace-first s #"-\w" (clojure.string/upper-case (str (second s))))
            )]
    (let [snake-case (re-seq #"-\w+" s)] 
      (if (nil? snake-case) 
        s
        (reduce #(str %1 (update-camel-part %2)) (re-find #"\w+(?=-)" s) snake-case))))
)

(fn [s]
  (loop [[h & t] s
         result []
         to-upper false]
    (cond
      (nil? h) (apply str result)
      (= \- h) (recur t result true)
      to-upper (recur t (conj result (Character/toUpperCase h)) false)
      :else (recur t (conj result h) false))))

(fn cc [s]
  (cond (empty? s) ""
    	(= (first s) \-) (str (clojure.string/upper-case (str (second s)))
                              (cc (drop 2 s)))
        :else (str (first s) (cc (rest s)))))

(fn into-camelcase [s]
  (loop
      [[c d & more] s
       acc []]
    (cond
      (and c d (= d \-))
      (recur (conj more d) (conj acc c))

      (and c d (= c \-))
      (recur more (conj acc (Character/toUpperCase d)))

      (and c d)
      (recur more (conj acc c d))

      c
      (recur more (conj acc c))

      :else
      (apply str acc))))

(fn intoCamelCase[word]
  (letfn [(firstLetter [s] (-> (str (first s))
                               .toUpperCase))
          (restPart[s] (reduce str (rest s)))]
  (let [parts (.split word "-")]
    (reduce #(str %1 (firstLetter %2) (restPart %2)) parts))))

(fn z [s]
  (loop [result s]
    (let [dash-index (.indexOf result "-")]
      (if (neg? dash-index)
        result
        (recur
          (str
            (subs result 0 dash-index)
            (clojure.string/upper-case (nth result (inc dash-index)))
            (subs result (+ dash-index 2))))))))

(fn camel-case
  [s]
  (reduce (fn [my-str item]
            (if (= (last my-str) \-)
              (str (clojure.string/replace my-str #"-" "") (clojure.string/upper-case item))
              (str my-str item))) "" s))

(fn [s]
  (let [sSplited (clojure.string/split s #"-")
        c (count sSplited)
        f (first sSplited)]
    (if (= c 1) s 
        (->> sSplited
             (rest)
             (map #(clojure.string/capitalize %))
             (clojure.string/join "")
             (str f)))))
